text: Shale is a web application framework maintained by the Apache Software Foundation. It is fundamentally based on JavaServer Faces. As of May 2009 Apache Shale has been retired and moved to the Apache Attic. ==See also== * Apache Struts ==References== * * ==External links== * Shale project homepage * JSF Central Interviews Craig McClanahan about Shale * Apache Shale Web framework project retired Shale Category:JavaServer Faces Category:Web frameworks
title: Apache Shale
